name: Futurejam
detailed_description:
Closed Alpha Sign Ups

Sign up on our website to be a part of our closed alpha test: https://2049vr.com/futurejamgame


Submit Your Music

Trailer Song: Atlanta - JERZYK Label: Black Hole Recordings Are you an artist? Contact us to get your song in the game.


About the Game

Hit the music! Live out your DJ fantasy in Futurejam, a VR music rhythm game set in the cyberpunk 2049. Playing the unique "HexaSynth" virtual instrument you'll feel like you're really playing the music. Keep up your hit streak and nail your timing to get the top of the leaderboards. Having a house party? Futurejam puts you front and center while your friends feel like they're at your gig with our spectator mode. This isn’t your dad’s music rhythm game. "Futurejam is the perfect combination of EDM, VR and cyberpunk." - Chris T., Managing Director, Unity3D "If you have ever wanted to know what it's like to be a DJ, this is it!" - Johnny B. Goode, Pyro Top 100 DJ

short_description: Live out your DJ fantasy in Futurejam, a VR music rhythm game set in the cyberpunk 2049.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
